meanings.definition: To come upon or meet with, especially unexpectedly.
meanings.sent1: While exploring the forest, I rencountered a friendly squirrel.
meanings.sent2: I rencountered an old friend at the grocery store yesterday.
meanings.sent3: The cat rencountered the same mouse every day, creating a funny routine.
meanings.sent4: In the maze of life, we often rencounter unexpected challenges.
meanings.sent5: The detective rencountered the mysterious figure in the dark alley.

meanings.definition: To engage in a meeting or encounter with someone or something.
meanings.sent1: She rencountered her favorite author at the book signing event.
meanings.sent2: The team rencountered difficulties during the project presentation.
meanings.sent3: The puppy rencountered the vacuum cleaner and barked playfully.
meanings.sent4: In the game, players rencounter powerful enemies in the final level.
meanings.sent5: The explorer rencountered the ancient ruins deep in the jungle.
